title: Who is Vidhi Shanghvi? Heir to ₹4 lakh crore pharma empire with an Ambani connection - Hindustan Times
summary:
Who is Vidhi Shanghvi? Heir to ₹4 lakh crore pharma empire with an Ambani connection

Publication Date: Dec 18, 2024 09:00 AM IST

Source: Hindustan Times

Vidhi Shanghvi, daughter of India’s richest healthcare billionaire Dilip Shanghvi, is the heir to a ₹4.35 lakh crore healthcare empire. She currently serves as Vice President of Sun Pharmaceutical Industries and has been pivotal in shaping the company’s strategic direction for over a decade.

  • She is an Economics graduate from the Wharton School, University of Pennsylvania.
  • Vidhi advocates for mental health and runs a non-profit initiative offering free holistic solutions.
  • Her father, Dilip Shanghvi, has a net worth of $29.2 billion, making him the wealthiest Indian in the healthcare sector.
  • Sun Pharmaceutical Industries is the fourth-largest specialty generic pharmaceutical company globally.
Dilip Shanghvi boasts a net worth of $29.2 billion.

Vidhi is married to Vivek Salgaocar, connecting her to the Ambani family through her husband's relatives.
newTitle: Who is Vidhi Shanghvi? Heir to ₹4 lakh crore pharma empire with an Ambani connection

Stocks to watch, December 18: Va Tech Wabag, Ambuja Cements, Vishal Mega Mart, Gulf Oil Lubricants, RITES, Jindal Saw, and more - Upstox
summary:
Stocks to watch, December 18: Va Tech Wabag, Ambuja Cements, Vishal Mega Mart, Gulf Oil Lubricants, RITES, Jindal Saw, and more

Date: December 18, 2024
Source: Reuters

The domestic equity market is anticipated to open lower on December 18, with key stocks in focus due to various corporate announcements and global market trends.

  • Va Tech Wabag: A ₹2,700 crore order from the Saudi Water Authority has been cancelled.
  • Aditya Birla Sun Life AMC: CEO Vikas Gautam resigns for personal commitments.
  • RITES: Awarded a ₹122.60 crore order from Meerut Development Authority.
  • Ambuja Cements: Merging Sanghi Industries and Penna Cement into its operations.
  • Gulf Oil Lubricants: Renewed strategic partnership with Piaggio India for lubricants.
  • Jindal Saw: Acquiring a stake in ReNew Green MHH One Private Limited.
  • MobiKwik, Vishal Mega Mart, Sai Life Sciences: Shares to be listed on NSE and BSE.
“This consolidation will help to streamline the organisation structure and simplify compliance requirements for effective governance,” Ambuja Cements stated regarding its merger.

The market responds to global trends and domestic corporate developments, highlighting significant movements expected from key players.
newTitle: Stocks to Watch for December 18: Key Market Movers

The December Federal Reserve Meeting Started Tuesday—What You Need to Know - Investopedia
summary:
The December Federal Reserve Meeting Started Tuesday—What You Need to Know

Publication Date: December 2023 | Source: Investopedia

The Federal Reserve's Open Markets Committee began its final meeting of the year, with expectations set for a key interest rate cut.

  • The meeting runs for two days and will conclude with a rate decision announcement on Wednesday.
  • A quarter percentage point cut in the federal funds rate is widely anticipated.
  • Economists are keenly interested in Fed Chair Jerome Powell's comments post-meeting.

Changes in the economy since the last meeting raise questions about future rate cuts, despite expectations of continued high consumer spending.

“The Fed will likely follow through so as not to thwart expectations but the odds it will take a pause in January have increased,” wrote Bob Schwartz, Senior Economist at Oxford Economics.

This meeting could set the stage for policy adjustments into the new year.
newTitle: Key Insights from the December Federal Reserve Meeting

US Federal Reserve meeting date and time: Where to watch FOMC interest rate decision and Fed chair Jerome Powe - CNBCTV18
summary:
US Federal Reserve meeting date and time: Where to watch FOMC interest rate decision and Fed chair Jerome Powell's speech

Date: December 17, 2024

Source: CNBC-TV18

The US Federal Reserve is set to begin its final policy meeting of 2024, with significant expectations for interest rate adjustments.

  • The meeting starts on December 17 and concludes on December 18, 2024.
  • A 25 basis point interest rate cut is anticipated, bringing the target range to 4.25%-4.5%.
  • Fed Chair Jerome Powell will address the media following the decision.
“The markets remain confident in a rate reduction, with a 99% probability indicated by CME Group’s FedWatch tool.”

This FOMC meeting could set the tone for economic policy as the new administration takes office in January 2025.
newTitle: Key Details on the Upcoming US Federal Reserve Meeting

title: Ola CEO Bhavish Aggarwal's stern message to employees goes viral: ‘HR will be having conversation…’ | Company Business News - Mint
summary:
Ola CEO Bhavish Aggarwal’s Stern Message to Employees Goes Viral

Publication Date: November 2023 Source: Live Mint

In a social media exchange that captured public attention, Bhavish Aggarwal, CEO of Ola, responded to comedian Kunal Kamra’s criticisms regarding Ola Electric's handling of customer complaints.

  • The spat started after Ola Electric failed to announce a plan addressing customer issues.
  • Aggarwal's comments about HR and employee conversations went viral.
  • Kunal Kamra called out the situation on his social media platforms.
“HR will be having conversation…” – Bhavish Aggarwal

This incident highlights ongoing tensions between company management and public perception, especially in the face of customer dissatisfaction.
newTitle: Ola CEO Bhavish Aggarwal’s Stern Message to Employees Goes Viral

title: Sebi tightens ODI guidelines to curb speculation and improve market integrity | Stock Market News - Mint
VA Tech Wabag's $317 million Saudi desalination plant order cancelled - CNBCTV18
summary:
VA Tech Wabag Cancels $317 Million Saudi Desalination Plant Order

Publication Date: December 17, 2024
Source: CNBC TV18

VA Tech Wabag announced the cancellation of its $317 million order for a 300 MLD Mega Sea Water Desalination Plant in Saudi Arabia.

  • The Saudi Water Authority notified the cancellation on December 16, 2024, due to internal administrative procedures.
  • The desalination plant was intended to be developed on a greenfield site on the west coast of KSA.
  • VA Tech Wabag is in discussions with the customer to understand the reasons for the cancellation.
  • The project included comprehensive scope covering design, engineering, supply, construction, and commissioning.
“The customer has notified all tender participants on December 16, 2024, that the said tender stands cancelled.” - VA Tech Wabag

This cancellation reflects ongoing challenges in securing contracts in international markets, impacting the company's stock performance.
newTitle: VA Tech Wabag Cancels $317 Million Saudi Desalination Plant Order

title: Trade setup for Wednesday: Top 15 things to know before the opening bell - Moneycontrol
Gold price under pressure ahead of the Fed meeting – Commerzbank - FXStreet
summary:
Gold Price Declines Ahead of Fed Meeting

Date: Recent
Source: Commerzbank

The Gold price has fallen to $2,650 per troy ounce, reversing most of the gains made earlier this week. Analysts attribute this decline to rising US bond yields and altered expectations regarding Fed interest rate cuts.

  • The Gold price experienced a significant drop, losing gains from earlier in the week.
  • US bond yields have sharply risen, increasing the opportunity cost of holding Gold.
  • Market expectations for Fed interest rate cuts have diminished, now anticipating only 50 basis points by mid-2025.
  • The upcoming Fed meeting is crucial, with expectations on future interest rate guidance influencing Gold prices.
“If the expectations of interest rate cuts then increase again, the Gold price could rise.” - Carsten Fritsch, Commodity Analyst at Commerzbank

The fluctuations in Gold prices highlight the impact of monetary policy expectations on commodity markets.
newTitle: Gold Price Declines Ahead of Fed Meeting, Analysts Weigh In

Shareholder nay to related party transactions may jeopardise Kalyani Group firm | Company Business News - Mint
summary:
Shareholder Rejection of Related Party Transactions Risks Kalyani Group's Operations

Publication Date: October 2023, Source: Live Mint

The minority shareholders of Automotive Axles Ltd have rejected proposed related party transactions with Meritor HVS India Ltd due to concerns about transparency, which could disrupt the company's operations.

  • Shareholders voiced concerns over the potential erosion of shareholder value.
  • Proxy advisory firms influenced the decision against the transactions.
  • The rejection could impact the operational strategies of Automotive Axles Ltd.
"The decision was influenced by proxy advisory firms about transparency and potential erosion of shareholder value."

This decision underscores the importance of shareholder oversight and governance in corporate transactions, potentially setting a precedent for similar actions in the future.
newTitle: Shareholder Rejection of Related Party Transactions Risks Kalyani Group's Operations

Shein must cede Indians’ data, control of local ops to re-enter India - TechCrunch
summary:
Shein Must Cede Indians' Data, Control of Local Ops to Re-Enter India

Publication Date: Not specified Source: TechCrunch

Shein has been allowed to re-enter the Indian market, but must hand over all data of Indian customers and cede control of its operations to Reliance Retail, according to recent government disclosures.

  1. Shein will operate as a technology partner, with Reliance Retail fully controlling the platform.
  2. The deal requires Shein's platform data to be hosted in India, ensuring data remains local.
  3. Reliance is subject to security audits by government-approved cybersecurity firms.
  4. The arrangement aims to bolster India's textile sector by utilizing local manufacturers for Shein-branded products.
  5. This approval process involved consultations across multiple government ministries amidst a broader context of bans on Chinese apps in India.
“The process to unban Shein involved extensive government vetting...”

This development marks a significant shift in India's approach towards Chinese companies amid ongoing tensions and regulatory scrutiny.
newTitle: Shein Must Surrender Data and Local Control to Re-Enter India

title: Databricks raises $10B as it barrels toward an IPO - TechCrunch
summary:
Databricks raises $10B as it barrels toward an IPO

Posted: 6:41 AM PST · December 17, 2024 | Source: TechCrunch

Databricks, the data analytics platform, has raised $10 billion in a funding round that values the company at $62 billion (up from $43 billion). Backers include Thrive Capital, Andreessen Horowitz, DST Global, GIC, and Iconiq Growth.

The round is one of the largest venture rounds in history, and will drive future mergers and acquisitions, stock payouts to employees, and expansion abroad, according to a statement obtained by CNBC.

Databricks’ mammoth “Series J” comes ahead of the company’s hotly anticipated IPO. Founded in 2013 by seven doctorate candidates from UC Berkeley, Databricks sells AI, big data analytics, and cloud tooling to enable companies to build data- and AI-powered applications.

Databricks expects to generate positive free cash flow for the first time with a $3 billion revenue run rate in the quarter that ends on January 31, according to CNBC. The company’s revenue in the October quarter grew more than 60% year over year.
newTitle: Databricks raises $10B as it barrels toward an IPO
